sentences.en: A population study from Finland has developed a fascinating scale that can predict 20-year risk for dementia –sort of a brain aging speedometer.
sentences.cn: 一项芬兰的人口学研究给出了一个引人注目的量表，能够预计20年罹患失忆症的风险，即一种大脑衰老的速度计。

sentences.en: Don't you ever look at the speedometer?
sentences.cn: 你就没看一看自己的速度表 么 ?

sentences.en: On a land vehicle the speed input is usually obtained from the speedometer drive system.
sentences.cn: 对地面运动体,输入速度通常由测速计的驱动系统来供给.

sentences.en: Once the speedometer is placed in a conventional sedan, the system test for the sedan would not road test it at 160 miles/hour.
sentences.cn: 但是一旦将速度计安装到家用轿车里面时，对于整部轿车的系统测试将不会在公路上测试160英里/小时这一速度值。

sentences.en: Sometimes the instruments are read-only, like your speedometer.
sentences.cn: 有些仪器是只读的，就像速度计一样；

sentences.en: The instrument that measures the speed is a speedometer.
sentences.cn: 用来测定速度的仪器是速度计.

sentences.en: The speedometer clicked off the mileage as they drove on.
sentences.cn: 他们驱车前进,里程计滴答滴答地把里程记录下来.
速度计读数是四十五英里.
速度计的指针转到一百哩.

sentences.en: The speedometer showed that we were doing 50 miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 计速表显示我们的时速是50英里.

sentences.en: The speedometer shows a reading of 10 miles per hour.
sentences.cn: 速度表读数为10英里每小时.
速度计指示着每小时95英里.

sentences.en: The speedometer was rocking between 60 and 65.
sentences.cn: 速度表在60至65之间摆动着.
速度计显示时速达120英里.

sentences.en: You can define the excessive speed of your motor - car by a speedometer.
sentences.cn: 你可以用速测表来确定摩托车已经超速.

sentences.en: Your speedometer is stuck in the max speed position.
sentences.cn: 你的测速表卡在最高速度位置上.

words.tran_cn: 速度，速率；迅速，快速；昌盛，繁荣
快速行动的人或物；调节速度装置
超速，加速；加速，迅速前行；兴隆
加快…的速度；使成功，使繁荣

trans.tran_en: an instrument in a vehicle that shows how fast it is going
